title: Drawing, "Plan of the Casino and Gardens of Giovenazzo", ca. 1750
medium:
Pen and brown ink, gray wash
Support: white laid paper
inscribed: in pen and brown ink on ribbon at top: PIANTA del CASINO e GIARDINO de GIOVENAZZO
provenance: Mr. and Mrs. Edward D. Brandegee; Giovanni Piancastelli
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
description: Scale: in pen and brown ink, at right margin

Drawing, "Plan of the Casino and Gardens of Giovenazzo", ca. 1750.
ca. 1750. Pen and brown ink, gray wash
